title: Santoshi Mata Aarti
lyrics:
Jai Santoshi Mata, Maiya Jai Santoshi Mata,
Sankat harana mangala dayini, Jai Santoshi Mata.

Aarti ki jai Santoshi Mata, Maiya jai Santoshi Mata,
Sankat harana mangala dayini, Jai Santoshi Mata.

Mangala ki seva sunaave, Nita nava din manadaata,
Sankat harana mangala dayini, Jai Santoshi Mata.

Sundar chir sunahari mukhada, Vrata ko dharan kare sakhi,
Sankat harana mangala dayini, Jai Santoshi Mata.

Bhakta pukara aankhiya tihari, Darsha dikhaaya daya nidhata,
Sankat harana mangala dayini, Jai Santoshi Mata.

Jai Santoshi Mata, Maiya Jai Santoshi Mata,
Sankat harana mangala dayini, Jai Santoshi Mata.

title: Ganesh Aarti
lyrics:
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva,
Mata jaki Parvati Pita Mahadeva.

Ek dant dayavant, Char bhuja dhari,
Mathe sindur sohe, Muse ki savari.

Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva,
Mata jaki Parvati Pita Mahadeva.

Andhan ko ankh det, Kodhin ko kaya,
Banjhan ko putra det, Nirdhan ko maya.

Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva,
Mata jaki Parvati Pita Mahadeva.

Paan chadhe, Phul chadhe, Aur chadhe meva,
Ladduan ka bhog lage, Sant kare seva.

Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva,
Mata jaki Parvati Pita Mahadeva.

title: Durga Aarti
lyrics:
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri,
Tumko nishdin dhyavat, Hari Bramha Shivji.

Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri,
Mang sindur birajat, Tiko mrigmadko.

Ujjval se dou naina, Chandravadan niko,
Kanak saman kalevar, Raktambar rajeo.

Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri,
Kanak saman kalevar, Raktambar rajeo.

Kanak saman kalevar, Raktambar rajeo.
Raktambar rajeo.

Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri.

title: Sant Tukaram Aarti
lyrics:
Ghei Chand Makarand, Bhakti Gheu Vitthal,
Dnyaneshwar Mauli, Nivadun Vishwa.

Tukaram aala vruksha, Kavadee pahilelya,
Bhakti Gheu Vitthal, Dnyaneshwar Mauli.

Tukaram aala vruksha, Kavadee pahilelya,
Bhakti Gheu Vitthal, Dnyaneshwar Mauli.

Ghei Chand Makarand, Bhakti Gheu Vitthal,
Dnyaneshwar Mauli, Nivadun Vishwa.

title: Sant Namdev Aarti
lyrics:
Bhava Sagara Taranaya, Namacha Gheu Savaya,
Namacha Gheu Savaya, Bhava Sagara Taranaya.

Bhava Sagara Taranaya, Namacha Gheu Savaya,
Namacha Gheu Savaya, Bhava Sagara Taranaya.

Dola Neeti Vahile, Vahile Bhakta Vatsala,
Bhava Sagara Taranaya, Namacha Gheu Savaya.

Namacha Gheu Savaya, Bhava Sagara Taranaya,
Namacha Gheu Savaya, Bhava Sagara Taranaya.

title: Vithoba Aarti
lyrics:
Tujhe Roop Chitti Raho, Muktaaya Tu Jeevo,
Tu Vrukshaas Tujeeve, Tu Shri Guru Daas.

Namo Namo Namo Namaste, Namaste Namaste Namaste.

Maja Tujhe Daasa, Maja Tujhe Daasa,
Tu Jiv Maja Jiva, Maj Maja Nidasa.

Namo Namo Namo Namaste, Namaste Namaste Namaste.

title: Sant Eknath Aarti
lyrics:
Jai Jai Vithoba Rakhumai, Eknath Bhakta Vatsala,
Namochkar Dukh Harana, Pancha Bhuta Taya Raja.

Jai Jai Vithoba Rakhumai, Eknath Bhakta Vatsala,
Namochkar Dukh Harana, Pancha Bhuta Taya Raja.

Shri Vithobancha Pandarapura, Shri Mukta Gaya Paaya,
Namochkar Dukh Harana, Pancha Bhuta Taya Raja.

title: Sant Dnyaneshwar Aarti
lyrics:
Brahma Murari Tripurantakari, Bhanu Shashi Bhumisutaya,
Buddha Shashanka, Ahish Chaturbhuja,
Kantamaha, Kapaladi, Kritamala, Dhyanavigraha.

Jai Dev Jai Dev, Jai Mangal Murti,
Darshan Matre Man Kamana Purti.

Jai Dev Jai Dev, Jai Mangal Murti,
Darshan Matre Man Kamana Purti.

title: Sant Gora Kumbhar Aarti
lyrics:
Gora Kumbhar Janmala, Bhakti Gheu Gana Ghara,
Gheu Vitthal Prasada, Tuzha Gora Kumbhar.

Jai Jai Panduranga, Rakumai Jai Janani,
Purna Shri Gurudeva, Tuzha Gora Kumbhar.

title: Sant Janabai Aarti
lyrics:
Bhava Sagara Taranaya, Janabai Gheu Namacha,
Namacha Gheu Savaya, Bhava Sagara Taranaya.

Bhava Sagara Taranaya, Janabai Gheu Namacha,
Namacha Gheu Savaya, Bhava Sagara Taranaya.

Dola Neeti Vahile, Vahile Bhakta Vatsala,
Bhava Sagara Taranaya, Janabai Gheu Namacha.
